input.sentences: the building itself was made of stone and looked very solid .
i think someone wanted the statue to look more modern .
i took the time to read about the history of the place .
i even noticed some nice plants they had around .
when i went back to my hotel | i kind of wished i was staying in the stone one instead .
output.sentences: We went to the city and toured the area.
We saw a really cool statue.
There was neat historical information all around.
The plants around town were really nice.
We wished that we could stay longer.
